name: 5 Long Red Pots
description: Set the balls as illustrated and start pot the red. You set the white ball a anyplace in field D.

name: Open the pack of 6 Reds
description: Set the color balls with your spot and a pack six reds next to the pink ball. Pot the red and blue and open the pack of six reds.

name: 10 Reds and 10 Pinks
description: Place the pink ball your spot and remaining balls set as illustrated. Pot the ten reds and ten pinks. Clear the table.

name: Pot the Pink from the spot
description: Place the pink ball your spot and the white ball set to anywhere in field D. Pot the pink.

name: The Line Up
description: The snooker line up exercise is probably the most common training exercise. This exercise is a must if you want to improve your game. Pot the reds and colours.

name: Safety zone
description: Hit the pack of reds and control the cue ball to finish in the zone by bottom cushion.

name: Open the pack of 3 reds
description: Good position after pot red ball is very important. You have to good position to open pack of three reds. Pot the red and black and open the pack of three reds.

name: Snookered behind the black
description: Getting out of difficult snooker and set snooker again. In this exercises everything is important, concentration, force, aiming.

name: High Black
description: Pot the black ball with high position as set the white ball on the good position to yellow ball. Clear the table.

name: You need a 43 to win
description: You need a 43 point! To win you have to pocket the last two reds with the black ball and then clear the table.

name: Only low colors
description: Set the balls as illustrated and start with anywhere. Pot the six reds with only the low colors on their spots.

name: 8 Reds and 8 Colors
description: Set the balls as illustrated and start with anywhere. Pot the eight reds and eight colors. Clear the table, You don't forget to concentration!

name: Low Black
description: Pot the black ball with low position as set the white ball on the good position to yellow ball. Clear the table.
